alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 2:08AM MST until February 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and most of west Texas. * WHEN...From 3 AM CST /2 AM MST/ to 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Motorists should exercise caution while driving in the wind advisory area. Be alert to sudden gusts of wind which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
